channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: MicroStrategy reports eighth straight week of share sales to fund bitcoin buys
Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway is buying up shares of a lagging 1990s dot-com darling
item.description: Berkshire invested $74 million in domain name and internet infrastructure company VeriSign this month.

item.title: Another Jeju Air jet has landing-gear issue, returns safely
item.description: A Jeju Air Co. jet suffered a landing-gear malfunction on Monday, a day after 179 people died in the country’s worst civil-aviation disaster.

item.title: NYSE to observe minute of silence in Jimmy Carter’s honor this morning
U.S. stock market to close for President Carter’s funeral on Jan. 9
Elon Musk eyes a deal with his native South Africa to let SpaceX offer Starlink service in exchange for a Tesla battery plant, report says
item.description: Musk’s political influence continues to grow.

item.title: U.S. stocks set for sharp opening-bell declines after premarket turn for worse
Walmart dominated, while Target spiraled: the winners and losers of retail in 2024
item.description: Starbucks had a tough year. Orders are getting increasingly complex, and that's led to long lines and incorrect pickup times.

item.title: All 30 components in the red as Dow industrials suffer 600-point decline
Elon Musk channels Hillary Clinton in calling Trump supporters ‘contemptible fools’ amid H-1B visa debate
item.description: Musk suggested MAGA hardliners "must be removed from the Republican Party, root and stem.”
